title: Headland Logo ideas?
content:
Hey guys and gals, I have designed this logo for a a company called Headland Properties and I can't match it with a font. Does anyone have any ideas of a font that would sit nicely with this mark?

Thanks!!!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20120415224707im_/http:/typophile.com/files/hp_4170.gif)
author: Daanen

comments.content: By the way - to me this marks reads either as 4P or HR, but not as HP.

If the bottom left stem of the H wasn't broken I'd see HP alright. The break makes the P look like an R with a break too. Also the broken H makes all the negative space very busy and distracting for what are actually very solid, sturdy letters.

HR here as well... Because both lack part of a letter...  
\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_  
_Robert Koritnik_
I am just left wondering why there are missing parts and then added parts.
